modName: Edward Kenway First Robes bug fix
summary: fix the bug of edward kenway armor
descriptionHtml:
Edward Kenway Governer Robes or Duncan Walpole Robes, are now in Skyrim.
The previous ver.1.0 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54815/?
you can craft it at any forge misc division with name governer armor and governer hood.
it's retexture from mage expert robe but it 75% accurate.
add new follower name edward kenway, using scimitar.
this one is still same but fix the bug
Bug fixed:
>People will not tell you naked again.
>The Robes now light armor
author: JuliusGeorgorius
